description: Brief personal video introduction with transcript, including reasons for entering the course and goals. Requires completion of FWS survey and submission in multiple parts.

Tracking and demonstrating skills progress through mapped assessments from 2nd/3rd year. Requires completion of mandatory activities and achieving minimum 40 points per Program Learning Outcome (PLO).

Curated professional ePortfolio demonstrating Program Learning Outcomes through coursework examples and external evidence. Includes portfolio-based resume (e.g., LinkedIn profile) and graduate digital portfolio for employability.
